# Workspace AI Memory
This file contains workspace-specific information for AI conversations.

## Memories/Facts
- **2025-11-08 21:07:** In the swiftui-showcase project's ShowcaseExample.xcodeproj, there are two schemes: "Showcase" builds the SDK/framework itself, while "ShowcaseExample" actually builds and runs the example app. Use the ShowcaseExample scheme when wanting to run the demo application.
